entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
